code: import axios from"axios";var url="https://wire-no-auth.herokuapp.com/posts";export var fetchPosts=function fetchPosts(){return axios.get(url);};export var createPost=function createPost(newPost){return axios.post(url,newPost);};export var updatePost=function updatePost(id,_updatePost){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),_updatePost);};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};export var likePost=function likePost(id){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id,"/likePost"));};
